name: After Study of the Bus Rapid Transit 'A Line' Impacts
purpose: Analyzed the A Line bus in the Twin Cities Region comparing its effects on traffic during the State Fair and during normal traffic conditions. Surveyed for specific commuter complaints
author: Alireza Khani
image_description: Image of the A Line bus overlayed over a Blue line Train Station
